ObjectClass.Name: Hydra (Sepiligo)
ObjectClass.Description:
HYDRA/SEPILIGO: Durable air supremacy bio-gunship
Variable atk rate: rises while stationary (400 QP), decreases after moving Devastating vs aircraft when energized
Upgrades: L-Tech: Progenerate Octo+Pharo pair

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: Move to specified location\ \Movement drains Weapon Energy \Move Speed: 12 (aircraft)\Vision Range: 28, Aggro Radius: 35

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \Fire-rate increases at W-Energy 20, 30 \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\Gnd: 75 (50, 25), R 22, Sta S\Air: 300 (200, 100), R 22, Sta S

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to a specified point in time\ \Recharges Shields 50%\Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires C-Tech\ upgrade at the MOUND

Objective.Name: Regenerate Shields
Objective.Details: \Fully restores shields\ \Process duration: 16 s\Avoid using near combat

Objective.Name: Meiotic Progenesis/Gestation
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires L-Tech\ upgrade at the MOUND

ObjectClass.Name: Sepiligo (Crashing!)
ObjectClass.Description:
Lookout!
This Sepiligo is out of control!
Blow it up or run away before it hits something

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 3, MaxInc: 45\Vision Range: 18, Aggro Radius: 25 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \+25% TSS Energy per attack \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\Gnd: 50, R 1, SR 3, Sta C
